snippet.title: Crisis Mountain for the Apple II
snippet.description:
Crisis Mountain is a classic platform game. Your task is to defuse bombs left by terrorists in mountain caverns when a dormant volcano above starts erupting unexpectedly. Time is limited as the bombs are ticking towards detonation. It contains nine levels of play.

Actually a fun game, but there unneccessary flaws which know how to ruin the fun. 

You can't press the jump button and move the joystick in a direction at the same time, because you only jump up then, the bombs have 2 different timers (what a bullshit idea), and you have to go to different places to defuse the bombs (couldn't it be just one and ONLY one place?)
